Articles.Content:
I'm new to the KSP Forum but I have 65 hrs of KSP playtime lol.

I can get a ship into orbit, and thats pretty much it.

Hello Kaizen and welcome to the forum!

Getting into orbit is a great start.  It's been said that "If you can get into orbit, you're halfway to anywhere."

It sounds like your KSP journey has just begun!  Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Hello Kaizen

Welcome to the nutty KSP peoples...

If you can fire up a vessel in Kerbin orbit you`re a real rocketscientist. Like most of us.
Congrats and have a good stay with us!
